content: everyday cable beanie a knitting pattern by erin gates 1 © lizzy knits llc 2020 i have a full video tutorial on my youtube channel for this pattern knit the everyday cable beanie materials 70 total yards 105g of super bulky weight yarn recommended yarn lion brand thick & quick us 13 9 0mm 16 circular needles us 15 10 0mm 16 circular needles us 15 10 0mm double pointed needles cable needle extra yarn for a pom pom optional pom pom maker optional stitch marker tapestry needle to weave in ends gauge using us 15 10 0mm needles 9 sts and 13 row make a 4 10cm square in stockinette stitch unblocked finished measurements 9 5 24 5cm tall with a 16 40 5cm circumference unstretched abbreviations co- cast on dpn s - double pointed needle s k- knit k2tog- knit two stitches together p- purl repeat- repeat round/rnds- round/rounds st s - stitch s 1/1 lc- 1 over 1 left cross slip 1 stitch onto a cable needle and drop to the front of your work knit 1 stitch from the left needle and then knit the stitch from the cable needle 2/1 lc- 2 over 1 left cross slip 2 stitches onto a cable needle and drop to the front of your work knit 1 stitch from the left needle and then knit the 2 stitches from the cable needle modification notes if you wish to change the circumference of the hat you can increase or decrease your number of cast on stitches by multiples of 4 if you wish to change the height of your hat take notice of rounds 6-10 i have instructed that you work this 5-round set a total of 4 times to make the body of the hat however you can add an extra repeat of this set or remove a set before starting the decreases 2 © lizzy knits llc 2020 pattern with us 13 9 0mm circular needles co 48 sts and join in the round add a stitch marker and slip the marker at the beginning of every round until you switch to dpns at the end rnds 1-5 *k1 p1 repeat from * to the end of the round switch to us 15 10 0mm circular needles round 6 *k3 p1 repeat from * to the end of the round round 7 *2/1 lc p1 repeat from * to the end of the round rnds 8-10 repeat round 6 rnds 11-25 repeat rnds 6-10 a further 3 times decrease rounds switch to us 15 10 0mm dpns round 26 *k1 k2tog p1 repeat from * to the end of the round 36 sts round 27 1/1 lc p1 repeat from * to the end of the round 36 sts round 28 *k2tog p1 repeat from * to the end of the round 24 sts round 29 *k1 p1 repeat from * to the end of the round 24 sts round 30 *k2tog repeat from * to the end
